description:
Control how Android detects captive portal. Captive Portal Controller lets you control how Android detects captive portal. NOTE: In many OEM provided ROMs, it is NOT a privacy feature because these ROMs are able to bypass captive portal settings. Features
  • Enable/disable captive portal detection
  • Set captive portal servers (with presets from GrapheneOS, Kuketz and Google)
  • A quick setting tile to toggle captive portal detection
  • Less than 100KB app as you don't need to use it frequently
